title: bbox
description: BBOX is a decentralized marketplace built on Bitcoin's Lightning Network, enabling fast, low-cost, and private transactions. It empowers users to buy and sell physical and digital products peer-to-peer, using tools like multisig escrow for secure payments, Nostr for private communication, and IPFS for immutable reviews. Designed for Bitcoiners and privacy advocates, BBOX offers a trustless, censorship-resistant platform to trade while fostering financial freedom and decentralization. 🚀
